main event: Two objects were sighted in Miles City, Montana on 15 April 1966, observed for approximately 10 minutes.
interesting points: The observer described the objects as having a classic spinning saucer shape with sharp edges., The objects remained in a fixed position relative to each other for about 9 minutes before moving away., The observer reported a very bright light coming from one of the objects., Local law enforcement deemed the observer as most unreliable., The observer had no military background and held unconventional beliefs regarding UFOs, influenced by a magazine article.
witness description: a 51-year-old unemployed laborer with no military background, described as extremely religious
